p: Angustanoic acid E ( 4) was obtained as a crystalline compound by normal phase column chromatography, eluting with a mixture of hexane/ethyl acetate. Its purity was controlled by normal phase TLC, with hexane/ethyl acetate 90:10 as eluting phase (Rf: 0.71). The structure was elucidated by 1H, 13C and DEPT NMR experiments. All spectroscopic data were consistent with those reported in the literature [ 29].
